alert.note: Alert for Greene; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morgan, southeastern Walton, northwestern Greene, north central Jasper and east central Newton Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Bostwick to Hard Labor Creek State Park to Covington, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Covington, Madison, Social Circle, Rutledge, Newborn, Mansfield, Bostwick, Woodville, Buckhead, Wrayswood, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Greshamville, Brick Store, Penfield, Apalachee and Farrar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central, north central, northeastern and east central Georgia.
